Description: The following statement contains a magic number: var statistics = from window in requests.Window(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(5)' playback.Scheduler)                              from stats in                                  (   // calculate statistics within one window                                      from request in window                                      group request by new                                          {                                              Milliseconds = Math.Ceiling(request.Duration.TotalMilliseconds * 10) / 10'                                              request.Url                                          } into g                                      from Count in g.Count()                                      select new                                      {                                          g.Key.Url'                                          g.Key.Milliseconds'                                          Count                                      })                                      .ToList()                               select stats;
